name: Data Link Server
description: Implements:JRE Functions, Security and Access Control andTime Syncronization and Coordination

name: Data Link Server Gateway
description: Implements: Data Link Gateway Functions (FJUG)(JRE JU)

name: XMPP Server
description: Generic XMPP Server - Implement all Chat Functionality from Server point of View

name: XMPP Client
description: Chat Client - Works with XMPP Server - Implement Client fucntions and Display

name: Email Server
description: Email Server - A software or system that handles the sending, receiving, storing, and forwarding of emails for users. It manages email communication using protocols like SMTP, IMAP, and POP3.

name: Email Client
description: Email Client - A software application used to access, send, receive, and manage emails. It connects to an email server to retrieve and send messages, often including additional features like calendar integration, contacts, and task management.
